metadata.title: CVE-2020-14938 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in map.c in FreedroidRPG 1.0rc2. It assumes lengths of data sets read from saved game files. It copies data from a file into a fixed-size heap-allocated buffer without size verification, leading to a heap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: freedroidrpg package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
